Chaos Aura: Give yourself random boons and your foe random conditions whenever you are struck.
Dark Aura: Surrounded by a dark aura that reduces incoming condition damage and causes torment each time you are struck (1-second cooldown per attacker).
Fire Aura: Enveloped in a fiery shield that burns foes, grants might each time you are struck (1-second cooldown per attacker).
Frost Aura: Chill foes that strike you (only once per second for each attacker); incoming damage is reduced by 10%.
Light Aura: When struck, you gain retaliation. Incoming condition damage is reduced by 10%.
Shocking Aura: Stun nearby attacking foes with an electric shock (only once per 2 seconds for each attacker).
